scripts.build: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix excel-addin
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix backend && npm run lint --prefix excel-addin
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check --prefix backend && npm run format:check --prefix excel-addin
scripts.format: npm run format --prefix backend && npm run format --prefix excel-addin
scripts.quality: npm run format:check && npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test
